name: Rain Runner
description:
RAIN. RUNNER.
Rain Runner is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS where you ditch your keyboard and only use your mouse! You’ll run constantly where you look, shoot targets and dash through challenging platforms. No checkpoints, no pauses: beat it in one sitting! Run, die, learn, repeat. Be better, be faster.

FEATURES.
  • 👟25 handcrafted, fast, and hard levels
  • 🕘About 30mins gameplay (unlimited, if you're up for challenge)
  • ⚔️Steam Leaderboard (best player featured in the main menu *wow*)
  • 🎶An original soundtrack consisting of 6 tracks
  • 🏆Cool achievements!
  • 💾NO saves and pauses, beat in one sitting!
  • ☠️Annoying meta-dialogues


Hi, it's SkyBrave! I make short games every month and sharing my journey for you!
